description:
Configuration for illustration generation.

This model defines the settings and preferences for generating
illustrations for translation segments.

style.description: The artistic style for generated illustrations

style_hints.description: Additional style hints or preferences for illustration generation
style_hints.title: Style Hints

segments_per_illustration.description: Number of segments to combine for each illustration
segments_per_illustration.title: Segments Per Illustration

max_illustrations.description: Maximum number of illustrations to generate (None for unlimited)
max_illustrations.title: Max Illustrations

skip_dialogue_heavy.description: Skip illustration for segments that are mostly dialogue
skip_dialogue_heavy.title: Skip Dialogue Heavy

min_segment_length.description: Minimum segment length (characters) to generate illustration
min_segment_length.title: Min Segment Length

title: IllustrationConfig
